title: Atul Auto arm partners with Jio Platforms for EV solutions
description: Atul Greentech partners with Jio Platforms to offer advanced electric vehicle solutions using Jio's IoT technology, focusing on three-wheeler platforms for both passenger and cargo vehicles. The collaboration aims to enhance EV production, tracking, navigation, and vehicle health monitoring domestically and globally.
